section.title: Subversion access
section.para: All FlyMine source code is available via our read-only public subversion server. If you don't have a subversion client on your computer, you can download one.

The URL for our subversion server is svn://subversion.flymine.org. To check out the absolute latest (development) FlyMine/InterMine code you would use the command svn co svn://subversion.flymine.org/trunk.

To download previous releases, download a particular branch. Release branches are named 'flymine_release_X_X_branch' where X_X is the release version. For example, to check out source code for release 3.1, run the command svn co svn://subversion.flymine.org/branches/flymine_release_3_1_branch/.
You can browse available branches here.
